member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.OverlayBackgroundColor
member.summary: Sets the style of the HTML div background-color. Use HTML specified: Color Names, RGB or with HEX values.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.OverlayOpacity
member.summary: Opacity of the overlay div. Value should be between 0..1. Where 0 means the overlay layer is not visible.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.CloseOnOverlayClick
member.summary: When true Modal dialog will be closed when Overlay (background) clicked. It works even if Overlay not visible (Opacity is set to 0)

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.CloseOnEscapeKey
member.summary: When true Modal dialog will be closed when Esc (Escape) key pressed.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.Height
member.summary: Modal dialog window Height in px if set to 0 Height is set auto.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.Width
member.summary: Modal dialog window Width in px if set to 0 Width is set auto.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.MinHeight
member.summary: Modal dialog window minimum Height in px.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.MinWidth
member.summary: Modal dialog window minimum Width in px.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.Focus
member.summary: When true Modal dialog will automatically set focus to itself when it opens, and set it bact to the last focused element when it closes. In general this should never be set to false as it makes the Modal less accessible to screen-readers, etc.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.Animate
member.summary: When true Modal dialog will appear and disappear by using smooth CSS slide and fade transitions.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.Centered
member.summary: When true Modal dialog will be vertically centered, otherwise shown near to the top. Modal dialog horizontally always centered.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.Header
member.summary: HTML content to show on the Modal header (top), right to the close button (if visible). Can be any valid HTML but should be only Title text. Must not be defined if you want to leave it out. Also ShowCloseButton must be set to false.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.Content
member.summary: Required HTML content to show on the Modal dialog. Can be any valid HTML.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.Footer
member.summary: HTML content to show on the Modal footer (bottom). Can be any valid HTML but should be only custom action buttons. Must not be defined if you want to leave it out.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.ShowCloseButton
member.summary: When true Modal dialog will show Header (even if Header is not defined) with closed x button.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.OnOpen
member.summary: Callback function called when the Modal dialog is opening.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.OnClose
member.summary: Callback function called when the Modal dialog is closing.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.OnCloseButtonClicked
member.summary: Callback function called when close x button was clicked.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.OnOverlayClicked
member.summary: Callback function called when Overlay (background) was clicked.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.OnEscapeKeyPress
member.summary: Callback function called when Esc key was pressed.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.OnTransitionEnded
member.summary: Callback function called when CSS transitions are ended. It will be triggered when dialog opened or closed.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.IsOpen
member.summary: Returns true if the Modal dialog is opened, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.Open
member.summary: When method called Modal dialog will be opened. It should be await-ed.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.Close
member.summary: When method called Modal dialog will be closed. It should be await-ed.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Modal.ModalDialog.DisposeAsync
member.summary: Async dispose
